name: Super BattleTrain
description:
Welcome to your very own super battle train!

Use the left and right keys to move, and the space bar to go choo choo.

Crash into the sides of the trains to gain speed, and crash into their back with enough speed to destroy them. Well... actually you destroy them anyway. But you only get score and power if you go fast enough.

Use the up key to boost yourself, or collect enough to activate your ability with the choo choo button! (or... collect even more until the bar turns blue... ehehehe)

Made for the VimJam 3 with the theme Turn up the Heat.
My game is only trying to capture this feeling of turning up the heat. Preferably with many explosions, and lots of game juice/energy.

Have fun! :)
